channel.title: GitHub Trending: SRecode Template, Today
channel.description: The top repositories on GitHub for srecode-template, measured daily

item.title: Matchoo95/JP-Subtitles #1 in SRecode Template, Today
item.description:
A bunch of subtitle files for a wide range of shows. Not all are perfectly timed so feel free to correct them and upload changes.

JP-Subtitles

Please upload correct timings if you have to retime any subtitles.

If you make changes, please leave a link to the video files that you used to time the subtitles with.

Please upload the link in the correct subtitles folder as a txt file with the same name as the subtitles folder.
item.author: Matchoo95
